channel.description: ARRiiVE: Innovations In Business Radio Show. Host Scott Andrews, CEO of ARRiiVE Business Solutions features advice and strategies on business launch, company growth, product launch, service launch, empowering employees for higher productivity, innovation, and sales improvement. Often, featuring special guest experts from around the world we live in. Now, you can take ARRiiVE: Innovations In Business with you on the road! Purchase any recorded show CD for only $19.95 (a 49.95 value) to reinforce the messages while driving or doing other business matters. Just reference the show name, date, and number and email us with your address. We'll send you a PayPal invoice and then ship you the CD. Easy as that! This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com

item.title: Real-world Marketing with Shel Horowitz on Innovations In Business
item.author: info@ARRiiVE.com
item.description:
Visit the ARRiiVE: Innovations in Business Show (http://www.talkshoe.com/tc/37798) at 2PM PST / 5PM EST on Wednesday, August 20th where Shel Horowitz discusses: Topic: Online Overkill! Go OFFLINE to build real relationships AND more sales. Dial: (724)444-7444 enter 37798 # 1 # to call the show. Online: Visit http://www.talkshoe.com/tc/37798 or http://www.arriive.com/arriive_liive.htm to listen online.
So many times we forget that people buy from people they feel they (1) know, (2) trust, and (3) who inspire them in some way, shape, or form. Let's face it: the computer is a bit impersonal. Are you so wrapped up in all your social networks, email strategies, and other modern approaches that you've forgotten the old-school marketing methods proven to work for the past 100 years? There's a reason people use direct mail, telephones, and face-to-face marketing to sell products, even in 2008.
This is your chance to straighten up and fly right and get your real-world marketing act together!
Join Scott Andrews, CEO of ARRiiVE Business Solutions, as he interviews Shel Horowitz, Author of GrassRoots Marketing and Principled Profit, for a special 45-minute show at ARRiiVE: Innovations In Business. It's simple and easy to call in or listen during the show broadcast.
If you miss the show, visit http://www.ARRiiVE.com for details on downloading the show later.
http://www.business-ethics-pledge.org http://www.frugalmarketing.com http://www.principledprofit.com/good-business-blog/

item.title: Guest Randy Peyser- How To Position Yourself As An Expert By Writing A Book
item.author: info@ARRiiVE.com
item.description:
Randy Peyser is our guest, speaking about "How to Position Yourself As An Expert By Writing A Book," with host Scott Andrews.
Want to be perceived as being a top expert in your field? Writing a book is one of the quickest ways to solidify your reputation, gain credibility in the eyes of your potential clients, and make yourself stand out above your competition. Having a book will not only help you attract more clients, it will also help you to extend your visibility and build your brand. Your book will further open many new doors for you to obtain massive media exposure for your company, attract JV partners, and seamlessly get new prospects into your pipeline.
In this talk, publishing dynamo, Randy Peyser, will show you how to:
Quickly write a powerful and easy-to-read book. Choose a topic that reflects your expertise, but also addresses your audience's pressing need. Use your book as a tool to upsell your more expensive services and products. Complete your book when everything else in your life and business is taking priority. Join in - it will be fun and entertaining, for sure!
